intent_analysis:
Intent: Abhisek intends to turn off all non-essential devices in his smart home as he leaves for work.  
Constraints & cues: There is no information on which devices Abhisek considers essential, and multiple devices are currently on, including three meross light strips, a Samsung TV, a refrigerator, and a dishwasher.  
Risk assessment: The lack of clarity regarding which devices are considered essential poses a risk of turning off devices that Abhisek may want to keep on, potentially leading to user dissatisfaction.
